attributes.action: consider a bank holiday or a specially recognised day every year, in the memory of Michael Jackson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Jackson sadly died on Monday 25th June 2009 and the whole world was shocked by his death. I feel that the Prime Minister should consider a new British bank holiday ,on the monday nearest to the day of his death, or a specially recognised day on the exact date of his death every year, so that the whole of the country can remember the king of pop, the  man who changed music forever and so his soul can live with us through the rest of our lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
